exception.span: 当任一参数为 时发生。

Docs.exception:
在以下情况下发生：Occurs in the following cases:
- 如果任一参数为空字符串。If any of the parameters are empty strings.
- 如果路径不是有效的绝对路径（即不在项目根路径下）。If the path is not a valid absolute path (that is, not under the project root path).
- 如果已存在具有所提供名称的 SharePoint 项目项。If a SharePoint project item with the provided name already exists.

span.span: The name of the project item.

The type of the project item.

param.name: skipAutoPackage
param.span: 如果为 ，项目系统不会自动添加项目项的功能或包。

span.span: If , the project system will not automatically add a feature or package for the project item.

- 如果路径不是有效的绝对路径（即不在项目根路径下）。If the path is not a valid absolute path (that is, not under the project root path).
- 如果已存在具有所提供名称的 SharePoint 项目项。If a SharePoint project item with the provided name already exists.
